===================
Power digit sum
====================
Problem 16

2^15 = 32768 and the sum of its digits is 3 + 2 + 7 + 6 + 8 = 26.

What is the sum of the digits of the number 2^1000?

==========================================================================

Yes, we can reuse the Biginteger implementation.

It runs in m x n being m the base and n the exponent.
